      • forceShutdown

      • handlePaket

        public static void handlePaket​(java.lang.String id,
                               java.lang.String paket)
        This procedure handles an incoming Paket from a client with a given id. If the protocol is correct, so the Paket is destin for the server, it gets handled.

      • sendPaket

        public static void sendPaket​(java.lang.String id,
                             java.lang.String paket)
        This procedure sends out Pakets to a given client or broadcasts it ("-1") to all clients.
